thread.title: Maguy Farah Reveals 2024 Expectations for Scorpio | Sada Elbalad
thread.title_full: Maguy Farah Reveals 2024 Expectations for Scorpio | Sada Elbalad

title: Maguy Farah Reveals 2024 Expectations for Scorpio | Sada Elbalad
text:
Rana Atef
A few days ago, prominent Lebanese astrologist Maguy Farah released her 2024 expectations for all Zodiac signs. Here are Farahâ€™s expectations for Scorpio.
2024 could be a year of shocking coincidences. They could benefit from various changes. Challenges would continue to threaten your resistance, therefore, you may need wisdom, and good thinking. You may need to double the efforts.
Their contacts and relationships may help them to face any issues.
This year for Scorpio people could be the year of unexpected returns, and the return of old friends or family members. Spring may embody some wishes and between September and October.
They may invest in a new job or get a promotion in work, despite the challenges of some planets, astrologically.
Jupiter moves into Gemini on May 26, would ease a lot of things.
They may achieve success communications, advertising, promotion, sales and trade.
They may address very old mistakes by some family members. Family concerns would be their priority.
Scorpio people may fall in love. They may meet a partner from another background or country.
2024 would include surprises, and they may lean towards a Capricorn, and an Aquarius would play a role in some of your choices. They would also feel comfortable with a Cancer, and they may find qualities that they like in a Libra. They could clash with a Leo or Taurus.
Their health would generally good.
